alert.note: Alert for Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 11:05PM EST until January 02 at 11:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM EST FOR EASTERN TAYLOR AND EASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 1105 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Madison to 13 miles south of Perry, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Madison, Perry, Lee, Pinland, Fish Creek, Jug Island, Boyd, Hopewell, Cherry Lake, Pinetta, Adams Beach, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Foley, Blue Springs, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport and Bucell Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
